short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: RChilli Oracle Extension is a powerful Browser extension that enhances a recruiting experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: RChilli Oracle extension is a powerful Chrome extension that enhances a recruiting experience by seamlessly adding candidate resumes and mapping them with your jobs. With its intuitive interface and robust features, the extension is designed with an aim to make the process of adding, updating, and mapping parsed candidate data faster, easier, and more efficient.
